description: This file defines a Python class 'WorkspaceSettings' using Pydantic for managing configuration settings related to a workspace, including environment variables, AWS configurations, image settings, and validation logic.

classes.name: WorkspaceSettings
classes.description: A Pydantic model class that encapsulates various configuration settings for a workspace, including environment variables, AWS settings, image build options, and validation logic.

methods.name: set_test_key
methods.description: Validator method to set the 'test_key' based on 'ws_name' and 'test_env' if not provided.

methods.name: set_dev_key
methods.description: Validator method to set the 'dev_key' based on 'ws_name' and 'dev_env' if not provided.

methods.name: set_stg_key
methods.description: Validator method to set the 'stg_key' based on 'ws_name' and 'stg_env' if not provided.

methods.name: set_prd_key
methods.description: Validator method to set the 'prd_key' based on 'ws_name' and 'prd_env' if not provided.

methods.name: set_subnet_ids
methods.description: Validator method to combine 'aws_public_subnets' and 'aws_private_subnets' into 'aws_subnet_ids' if not explicitly provided.
